ygData.subject: Re: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: Nice to meet you Lent.  Unfortunately there are very very few emails that come through this list, these days.  Probably since all the research spells have been
ygData.messageBody:
Nice to meet you Lent. Unfortunately there are very very few emails that
come through this list, these days. Probably since all the research spells
have been discovered. Formulas can be found at a number of web sites.
Probably the premier wizard web site would be: http://www.graffe.com/

If you have any questions feel free to ask, though I am not sure how many
people still subscribe to this list.

Lomack, 57th Evoker
Lojack, 57th Blackguard
Brotherhood of the Crimson Knights (www.bck.org)
Fennin Ro

>Hail and Well met.
>
>I am Lentiil Suupe, Wizard of 38, and leader of Diamond Phoenix of
>Fennin RO.
>
>I have been playing now for 2+ years.. Still trying to get my skills
>up, and hoping I will be able to obtain some advise on this list.
>
>Good Hunting
>
>Lent
